sections.heading: area; abandoned vehicle; penalty
sections.text: Any person who abandons any motor vehicle, trailer, or other conveyance in a recreation area shall be guilty of a Class V misdemeanor.SourceLaws 1984, LB 861, ยง 10.

2-3298.Recreation area; abandoned vehicle; penalty.

Any person who abandons any motor vehicle, trailer, or other conveyance in a recreation area shall be guilty of a Class V misdemeanor.

SourceLaws 1984, LB 861, ยง 10.
